name: find_entity
description: Find all <r, t> that has the relation <input, r, t> from Wikidata. It looks like viewing the main page of the input entity. The result is in json format.

input.description: The input entity(in QID) to find relations and properties for.

name: find_entity_by_tail
description: Find all <h, r> that has the relation <h, r, input> from Wikidata. It looks like viewing the reverse main page of the input entity. The result is in json format.

input.description: The input tail to find head entities and relations for.

name: get_entity_id
description: Search for all the entities that has the surface form as the input. For example, all the entities that are named ''Obama'', including either person, book, anything else.

input.description: The surface form(like a keyword) to search for entities.

name: get_relation_id
description: The surface form to search for relations.

input.description: The surface form(like a keyword) to search for relations.

name: search_by_code
description: After knowing the unique id of entity or relation, perform a sparql query.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
